tags: An*l   Ancient China   Beautiful Female Lead   Black Belly   Curious Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Possessive Characters   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Short Story
author: Yuan Yuan   元媛
description:
The first book in 'The Daughter and The Evil Bully' (千金與惡霸) series. There are five series related.

–

Tch, even if he made her feel grateful for saving her from bandits, he doesn’t have to “eat” her mouth, right?

If he is hungry, she can buy him something to eat!

But he is a really good guy.

Not only willing to bring her home, but he still claims that he wants to make her “happy”…

Er, except... his “house” is very strange. And everyone calls him “Boss”...

As it turns out he is actually the head of the mountain stronghold. Moreover, his meaning of “happy” is completely different from hers.

Making her feel self-conscious, it was a very painful feeling…

Ah, to like a person, will it not “hurt”? Otherwise, why would her heart start to hurt when she heard that he already has a fiancee?>
